Articles.Content:
BEFORE SOMEONE SAYS 'YOU CAN'T POST THIS TYPE OF THREAD HERE' I JUST WANT TO SAY THAT I AM NEW TO THE FORUMS AND I HAD NO IDEA WHERE TO PUT THIS. Thank you.

I give a challenge to all of you to build me a type of ship with specific requirements. I'm just looking for ideas from you guys and gals. (Note: You can keep the craft file of your creation for yourself, you just need to give me a copy.)

Requirements:

1000-2000 Ton Payload Capacity (Mods can be used to see whether it can hold such an amount)

Able to refuel.

Must be able to get from Kerbin to other planets/moons. (Minmus at the least, and I would prefer if it could get to Duna)

Can actually take off from the runway and get into space. (About time I note that it does NOT have to be an SSTO but I would like if it was.)

At the least, 100,000 LF, 40,000 OX, 10,000 EC, 10,000 MonoProp, 5,000 Ore Capacity and 10,000 XenonGas.

Science Equipment

Must be able to land.

Must have atleast one rover and scout ship.

10-30 Crew 

 

OPTIONAL:

Make it a tough kitty.

 

 

 

I am probably NOT going to get this built for me...

I will also note that I might edit the craft.

 

The only mod that can be used for parts is OPT.

 

Edited June 17, 2017 by Zythium17

YOU CAN'T POST THIS TYPE OF THREAD HERE, so I moved it to the right place. 

Welcome to our forum.

19 minutes ago, Zythium17 said:

BEFORE SOMEONE SAYS 'YOU CAN'T POST THIS TYPE OF THREAD HERE' I JUST WANT TO SAY THAT I AM NEW TO THE FORUMS AND I HAD NO IDEA WHERE TO PUT THIS. Thank you.

Woah...... Why do you even need 1000-2000 ton payload capacities?

And that many resources? Also, land where? And that many crew?

Most is feasible in stock, although are you sure you aren't exaggerating this a bit?

qzgy

1000-2000 Payload Capacity: It's a freighter...and besides i need to transport a lot of stuff.

That many resources: Well, it's meant to fuel other craft, except i forgot to put that in the actual post.

Land where: Anywhere on planets or moons. It doesn't matter.

Many Crew: Well what do i need to control my rovers & scoutships? Sure, remote control could work but i like kerbalnauts.

Am I exaggerating: I figured i was, but i believe its possible.

omg why do you need 1000 to 2000 tons ???? thats enough for like 2 ssto's and if possible i could make a rover scout ship all in one
